graph.original_query: I want to know the features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, get me details of security features.

T001.initial_thoughts: Let me think through this. The user wants detailed security features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. I need to search the web for the official Mahindra website, reputable automotive news articles, and official brochures to gather this information. I will focus on active and passive safety systems, driver-assistance technologies, and anti-theft measures. I will also provide links to the sources.

code.CODE_1:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO security features active safety passive safety driver-assistance technologies anti-theft systems', 8)
output = {'security_features': results}
code.CODE_2:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO official website brochure safety specifications', 6)
output = {'security_features': results}
code.CODE_3:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety review rating features', 5)
output = {'security_features': results}

security_features.text: [{'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': "[error] 'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 195-196: character maps to <undefined>", 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'HOME BUY NEW CAR BLOG Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. The XUV 3XO is one of the latest examples of how, in this range and segment, Mahindra can offer great safety. There is a lot that this sub-compact SUV has to offer in terms of safety. In this blog, we will closely examine some of t", 'images': [{'url': 'https://www.newznew.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/XUV-3XOs-Safety-Features.webp', 'alt_text': "XUV 3XO's Safety Features", 'width': '1599', 'height': '900', 'class': 'aligncenter size-full wp-image-112693', 'confidence': 0.9999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://automotivemahindra.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-variants-explained/', 'content': 'Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO | Automotive Mahindra Skip to main content Sales:6309432323 Service:6309666592 Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO By admin May 30, 2024 December 30th, 2024 No Comments Home BLOG Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO All Variants Explained Bookings for the Mahindra XUV 3XO began on May 15 in India, while deliveries got initiated from May 26. Not only does the Compact SUV come with Everything You Want & More, but it also has a significantly updated look. Since the Mahindra XUV 300s powertrain configuration is the same as that of the small SUV, there are no changes to its technical specifications. The SUVs front profile appears more forceful thanks to its redesigned radiator grille, new projector headlights, and inverted LED daytime running lights. The Hyundai Venue, Maruti Suzuki Brezza, and Tata Nexon are among the best-selling cars in the segment that the car will go up against. Pay a minimum of Rs 21,000* at the Automotive showrooms like Mahindra 3XO Showroom in Hyderabad to book the compact SUV now. The fact that the official statistics show an astounding 50,000 BOOKINGS IN 60 MINUTES is exciting. Ex-showroom, the SUVs price ranges from Rs 7.48* Lakh to Rs 15.49* Lakh. Overview of Top Features This car is amazing with its 10.25-inch infotainment system and driver display, digital instrument cluster, ambient lighting, wireless charging, dual-zone climate control, Adrenox, ventilated front seats, and powered driver seats. It also has a 360-degree surround camera. Along with Apple CarPlay, a Type-C charging port, wireless Android Auto setup, and many other car connection features, it also has these features. Level-2 ADAS, panoramic sunroof category first introduced with the Mahindra 3XO. Also, theres a replacement of the XUV300 Variants with the labels MX and AX in 3XO. The major upgrades in Mahindra XUV 3XO are set to make the driving experience, comfort, safety, and technology more advanced. Safety There are six airbags as standard on all models of car. It also has a rear disc brake, an ISOFIX anchor, and electronic stability control. A level 2 advanced driver assistance system is among the safety systems that are included with the top 3XO model. A 360-degree camera, hill-start assistance, blind spot monitoring, and an electronic parking brake with auto hold are among the other safety features. Talk to the expert staff of Automotive Mahindra Dealers Hyderabad to know more information on safety. Engine There are three different engine options available for the vehicle. A 1.5-liter diesel engine with 115 horsepower is produced. A 1.2-liter gasoline engine with turbocharging generates 110 horsepower, while another 1.2-liter engine with turbocharging generates 129 horsepower. Additionally, a 6-speed manual or automatic transmission is an option with this. The XUV 3XO boasts a wide variety of premium turbo engines designed for exhilarating performance and outstanding efficiency. In keeping with the brands tradition of delivering thrilling performance, the mStallion TGDi and Turbo Diesel engines produce best-in-class power and torque of 96 kW (130 PS) & 230 Nm and 85.8 kW (117 PS) & 300 Nm, respectively. The mStallion TGDi can accelerate from 0 to 60 km/h in 4.5 seconds and has a segment-best fuel efficiency of 20.1 km/l* with a manual gearbox. A 6-speed AISIN 3rd Gen Automatic Transmission, which is well-known for its dependability and durability, powers the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This is proved by the fact that it was effectively adopted by the XUV 700, which also utilizes a transmission from the same family. Together with seamless gear changes, the transmission is tuned to deliver exceptional fuel economy and a fun to drive experience. When you visit the Automotive showrooms like Mahindra 3XO Showroom in Nizamabad , you can see a thorough overview of the engine options and the improved perform', 'images': [{'url': 'https://automotivemahindra.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Mahindra-1200x400-GP.jpg', 'alt_text': 'Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'class': 'hidden-social-img', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 5}, {'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h4AaWHEiaus', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 6}, {'url': 'https://www.bajajfinserv.in/mahindra-xuv-3xo-safety-rating', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 7}, {'url': 'https://www.carandbike.com/mahindra-cars/xuv-3xo/safety-rating', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 8}]

nodes.description: Retrieve details of Mahindra XUV 3XO security features from reliable sources like the official Mahindra website and reputable automotive news articles.
nodes.agent_prompt: Retrieve comprehensive details on the security features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO from the official Mahindra website and reputable automotive news articles, and official brochures. Focus specifically on active and passive safety systems, driver-assistance technologies, and any anti-theft measures. Provide links to sources.

output.initial_thoughts: Let me think through this. The user wants detailed security features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. I need to search the web for the official Mahindra website, reputable automotive news articles, and official brochures to gather this information. I will focus on active and passive safety systems, driver-assistance technologies, and anti-theft measures. I will also provide links to the sources.

code.CODE_1:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO security features active safety passive safety driver-assistance technologies anti-theft systems', 8)
output = {'security_features': results}
code.CODE_2:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO official website brochure safety specifications', 6)
output = {'security_features': results}
code.CODE_3:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety review rating features', 5)
output = {'security_features': results}

Not only does the Compact SUV come with Everything You Want & More, but it also has a significantly updated look. Since the Mahindra XUV 300s powertrain configuration is the same as that of the small SUV, there are no changes to its technical specifications. The SUVs front profile appears more forceful thanks to its redesigned radiator grille, new projector headlights, and inverted LED daytime running lights. The Hyundai Venue, Maruti Suzuki Brezza, and Tata Nexon are among the best-selling cars in the segment that the car will go up against. Pay a minimum of Rs 21,000* at the Automotive showrooms like Mahindra 3XO Showroom in Hyderabad to book the compact SUV now. The fact that the official statistics show an astounding 50,000 BOOKINGS IN 60 MINUTES is exciting. Ex-showroom, the SUVs price ranges from Rs 7.48* Lakh to Rs 15.49* Lakh. Overview of Top Features This car is amazing with its 10.25-inch infotainment system and driver display, digital instrument cluster, ambient lighting, wireless charging, dual-zone climate control, Adrenox, ventilated front seats, and powered driver seats. It also has a 360-degree surround camera. Along with Apple CarPlay, a Type-C charging port, wireless Android Auto setup, and many other car connection features, it also has these features. Level-2 ADAS, panoramic sunroof category first introduced with the Mahindra 3XO. Also, theres a replacement of the XUV300 Variants with the labels MX and AX in 3XO. The major upgrades in Mahindra XUV 3XO are set to make the driving experience, comfort, safety, and technology more advanced. Safety There are six airbags as standard on all models of car. It also has a rear disc brake, an ISOFIX anchor, and electronic stability control. A level 2 advanced driver assistance system is among the safety systems that are included with the top 3XO model. A 360-degree camera, hill-start assistance, blind spot monitoring, and an electronic parking brake with auto hold are among the other safety features. Talk to the expert staff of Automotive Mahindra Dealers Hyderabad to know more information on safety. Engine There are three different engine options available for the vehicle. A 1.5-liter diesel engine with 115 horsepower is produced. A 1.2-liter gasoline engine with turbocharging generates 110 horsepower, while another 1.2-liter engine with turbocharging generates 129 horsepower. Additionally, a 6-speed manual or automatic transmission is an option with this. The XUV 3XO boasts a wide variety of premium turbo engines designed for exhilarating performance and outstanding efficiency. In keeping with the brands tradition of delivering thrilling performance, the mStallion TGDi and Turbo Diesel engines produce best-in-class power and torque of 96 kW (130 PS) & 230 Nm and 85.8 kW (117 PS) & 300 Nm, respectively. The mStallion TGDi can accelerate from 0 to 60 km/h in 4.5 seconds and has a segment-best fuel efficiency of 20.1 km/l* with a manual gearbox. A 6-speed AISIN 3rd Gen Automatic Transmission, which is well-known for its dependability and durability, powers the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This is proved by the fact that it was effectively adopted by the XUV 700, which also utilizes a transmission from the same family. Together with seamless gear changes, the transmission is tuned to deliver exceptional fuel economy and a fun to drive experience. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. nodes.description: Distill the retrieved information into a concise summary of the Mahindra XUV 3XO's security features. Provide a detailed list of features like airbags, ABS, ESC, ADAS, etc.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the information retrieved in T001 and create a concise summary of the Mahindra XUV 3XO's security features. Include a detailed list of features such as the number and type of airbags, ABS, Electronic Stability Control (ESC), Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems (ADAS) features, anti-theft measures, and any other relevant security technologies. Focus on details, specs, and technologies
